statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory;
SELECT id, name, price FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory;
SELECT name, description FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE price >= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, quantity, created_at FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, category FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY category, name;
SELECT * FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, description, quantity FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE name LIKE '%shirt%' OR description LIKE '%comfort%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM virtual_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 OR price < 100 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT quantity, item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 OR price > 100.00 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-07-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM inventory ORDER BY item_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity AS available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT i.item_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity_sold FROM inventory i JOIN sales s ON i.item_id = s.item_id;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, u.email, s.total_price FROM users u JOIN sales s ON u.user_id = s.sale_id;
SELECT * FROM merchandise;
SELECT name, price FROM merchandise WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT description, price FROM merchandise ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM merchandise WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM merchandise WHERE quantity > 0 AND price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.total_price, t.status FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN transactions t ON p.purchase_id = t.purchase_id WHERE t.status = 'completed';

SELECT m.name, p.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM merchandise m JOIN purchases p ON m.merchandise_id = p.merchandise_id JOIN transactions t ON p.purchase_id = t.purchase_id WHERE t.payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, m.name, p.quantity, t.transaction_date, p.total_price FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN merchandise m ON p.merchandise_id = m.merchandise_id JOIN transactions t ON p.purchase_id = t.purchase_id WHERE u.role = 'admin' AND t.status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Inventory ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT Users.username, Transactions.payment_method FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.user_id WHERE Transactions.total_amount > 500;
